text: Donzdorf is a town in Göppingen in Baden-Württemberg in southern Germany. It is 12 km east of Göppingen, and 13 km south of Schwäbisch Gmünd. The town is known for being the headquarters of the largest heavy metal record label Nuclear Blast Records. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Göppingen (district)
title: Donzdorf
